verses.verse: וַיִּזְכֹּ֤ר <S%H2142><s%> remembered אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> And God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נֹ֔חַ <S%H5146><s%> Noah וְאֵ֤ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַֽחַיָּה֙ <S%H2416><s%> and every living thing וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַבְּהֵמָ֔ה <S%H929><s%> and all the cattle אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after אִתּ֖וֹ <S%H854><s%> in בַּתֵּבָ֑ה <S%H8392><s%> that [was] with him in the ark וַיַּעֲבֵ֨ר <S%H5674><s%> to pass אֱלֹהִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> and God ר֙וּחַ֙ <S%H7307><s%> a wind עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the earth וַיָּשֹׁ֖כּוּ <S%H7918><s%> asswaged הַמָּֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> and the waters

וַיִּסָּֽכְרוּ֙ <S%H5534><s%> were stopped מַעְיְנֹ֣ת <S%H4599><s%> The fountains תְּה֔וֹם <S%H8415><s%> also of the deep וַֽאֲרֻבֹּ֖ת <S%H699><s%> and the windows הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <S%H8064><s%> of heaven וַיִּכָּלֵ֥א <S%H3607><s%> was restrained הַגֶּ֖שֶׁם <S%H1653><s%> and the rain מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <S%H8064><s%> from heaven

וַיָּשֻׁ֧בוּ <S%H7725><s%> returned הַמַּ֛יִם <S%H4325><s%> And the waters מֵעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> from הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> from off the earth הָל֣וֹךְ <S%H1980><s%> steadily וָשׁ֑וֹב <S%H7725><s%> receded וַיַּחְסְר֣וּ <S%H2637><s%> were abated הַמַּ֔יִם <S%H4325><s%> the waters מִקְצֵ֕ה <S%H7097><s%> and after the end חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <S%H2572><s%> and fifty וּמְאַ֖ת <S%H3967><s%> of the hundred יֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> days

וַתָּ֤נַח <S%H5117><s%> rested הַתֵּבָה֙ <S%H8392><s%> And the ark בַּחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הַשְּׁבִיעִ֔י <S%H7637><s%> in the seventh בְּשִׁבְעָה־ <S%H7651><s%> seven עָשָׂ֥ר <S%H6240><s%> teen י֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day לַחֹ֑דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> of the month עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> upon הָרֵ֥י <S%H2022><s%> upon the mountains אֲרָרָֽט׃ <S%H780><s%> of Ararat

וְהַמַּ֗יִם <S%H4325><s%> And the waters הָיוּ֙ <S%H1961><s%> become הָל֣וֹךְ <S%H1980><s%> continually וְחָס֔וֹר <S%H2637><s%> decreased עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> until הַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הָֽעֲשִׂירִ֑י <S%H6224><s%> the tenth בָּֽעֲשִׂירִי֙ <S%H6224><s%> in the tenth בְּאֶחָ֣ד <S%H259><s%> [month] on the first לַחֹ֔דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> [day] of the month נִרְא֖וּ <S%H7200><s%> seen רָאשֵׁ֥י <S%H7218><s%> were the tops הֶֽהָרִֽים׃ <S%H2022><s%> of the mountains

וַֽיְהִ֕י <S%H1961><s%> came מִקֵּ֖ץ <S%H7093><s%> And it came to pass at the end אַרְבָּעִ֣ים <S%H705><s%> of forty י֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> days וַיִּפְתַּ֣ח <S%H6605><s%> opened נֹ֔חַ <S%H5146><s%> that Noah אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חַלּ֥וֹן <S%H2474><s%> the window הַתֵּבָ֖ה <S%H8392><s%> of the ark אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשָֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> which he had made

וַיְשַׁלַּ֖ח <S%H7971><s%> And he sent forth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָֽעֹרֵ֑ב <S%H6158><s%> a raven וַיֵּצֵ֤א <S%H3318><s%> which went forth יָצוֹא֙ <S%H3318><s%> to וָשׁ֔וֹב <S%H7725><s%> and fro עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until יְבֹ֥שֶׁת <S%H3001><s%> were dried up הַמַּ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> until the waters מֵעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> from הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> from off the earth

וַיְשַׁלַּ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> Also he sent forth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיּוֹנָ֖ה <S%H3123><s%> a dove מֵאִתּ֑וֹ <S%H854><s%> for לִרְאוֹת֙ <S%H7200><s%> from him to see הֲקַ֣לּוּ <S%H7043><s%> were abated הַמַּ֔יִם <S%H4325><s%> if the waters מֵעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> from פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> from off the face הָֽאֲדָמָֽה׃ <S%H127><s%> of the ground

וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no מָצְאָה֩ <S%H4672><s%> found הַיּוֹנָ֨ה <S%H3123><s%> But the dove מָנ֜וֹחַ <S%H4494><s%> no rest לְכַף־ <S%H3709><s%> for the sole רַגְלָ֗הּ <S%H7272><s%> of her foot וַתָּ֤שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> and she returned אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> about אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to him הַתֵּבָ֔ה <S%H8392><s%> unto him into the ark כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for מַ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> for the waters עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> was on פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> [were] on the face כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the whole earth וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> then he put forth יָדוֹ֙ <S%H3027><s%> his hand וַיִּקָּחֶ֔הָ <S%H3947><s%> and took her וַיָּבֵ֥א <S%H935><s%> and pulled her in אֹתָ֛הּ <S%H853><s%> אֵלָ֖יו <S%H413><s%> about אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַתֵּבָֽה׃ <S%H8392><s%> unto him into the ark

וַיָּ֣חֶל <S%H2342><s%> And he stayed ע֔וֹד <S%H5750><s%> yet שִׁבְעַ֥ת <S%H7651><s%> seven יָמִ֖ים <S%H3117><s%> days אֲחֵרִ֑ים <S%H312><s%> yet other וַיֹּ֛סֶף <S%H3254><s%> and again שַׁלַּ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> he sent forth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיּוֹנָ֖ה <S%H3123><s%> the dove מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַתֵּבָֽה׃ <S%H8392><s%> out of the ark

וַתָּבֹ֨א <S%H935><s%> came in אֵלָ֤יו <S%H413><s%> about הַיּוֹנָה֙ <S%H3123><s%> And the dove לְעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> toward עֶ֔רֶב <S%H6153><s%> evening וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold עֲלֵה־ <S%H5929><s%> leaf זַ֖יִת <S%H2132><s%> [was] an olive טָרָ֣ף <S%H2965><s%> pluckt off בְּפִ֑יהָ <S%H6310><s%> and lo in her mouth וַיֵּ֣דַע <S%H3045><s%> knew נֹ֔חַ <S%H5146><s%> so Noah כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for קַ֥לּוּ <S%H7043><s%> were abated הַמַּ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> that the waters מֵעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> from הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> from off the earth

וַיִּיָּ֣חֶל <S%H3176><s%> And he stayed ע֔וֹד <S%H5750><s%> unto him any more שִׁבְעַ֥ת <S%H7651><s%> seven יָמִ֖ים <S%H3117><s%> days אֲחֵרִ֑ים <S%H312><s%> yet other וַיְשַׁלַּח֙ <S%H7971><s%> and sent forth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיּוֹנָ֔ה <S%H3123><s%> the dove וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יָסְפָ֥ה <S%H3254><s%> not again שׁוּב־ <S%H7725><s%> which returned אֵלָ֖יו <S%H413><s%> about עֽוֹד׃ <S%H5750><s%> yet

וַֽ֠יְהִי <S%H1961><s%> came בְּאַחַ֨ת <S%H259><s%> [month] the first וְשֵׁשׁ־ <S%H8337><s%> And it came to pass in the six מֵא֜וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundredth שָׁנָ֗ה <S%H8141><s%> and first year בָּֽרִאשׁוֹן֙ <S%H7223><s%> in the first בְּאֶחָ֣ד <S%H259><s%> the first לַחֹ֔דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> [day] of the month חָֽרְב֥וּ <S%H2717><s%> were dried up הַמַּ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> the waters מֵעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> from הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> from off the earth וַיָּ֤סַר <S%H5493><s%> removed נֹ֙חַ֙ <S%H5146><s%> and Noah אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִכְסֵ֣ה <S%H4372><s%> the covering הַתֵּבָ֔ה <S%H8392><s%> of the ark וַיַּ֕רְא <S%H7200><s%> and looked וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold חָֽרְב֖וּ <S%H2717><s%> was dry פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> and behold the face הָֽאֲדָמָֽה׃ <S%H127><s%> of the ground

וּבַחֹ֙דֶשׁ֙ <S%H2320><s%> month הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <S%H8145><s%> And in the second בְּשִׁבְעָ֧ה <S%H7651><s%> on the seven וְעֶשְׂרִ֛ים <S%H6242><s%> and twentieth י֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day לַחֹ֑דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> of the month יָבְשָׁ֖ה <S%H3001><s%> dried הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> was the earth ס
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> And God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to נֹ֥חַ <S%H5146><s%> unto Noah לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

צֵ֖א <S%H3318><s%> Go forth מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> out הַתֵּבָ֑ה <S%H8392><s%> of the ark אַתָּ֕ה <S%H859><s%> you וְאִשְׁתְּךָ֛ <S%H802><s%> thou and thy wife וּבָנֶ֥יךָ <S%H1121><s%> and thy sons וּנְשֵֽׁי־ <S%H802><s%> wives בָנֶ֖יךָ <S%H1121><s%> and thy sons' אִתָּֽךְ׃ <S%H854><s%> for

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every הַחַיָּ֨ה <S%H2416><s%> with thee every living thing אֲשֶֽׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after אִתְּךָ֜ <S%H854><s%> for מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all בָּשָׂ֗ר <S%H1320><s%> that [is] with thee of all flesh בָּע֧וֹף <S%H5775><s%> [both] of fowl וּבַבְּהֵמָ֛ה <S%H929><s%> and of cattle וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and every הָרֶ֛מֶשׂ <S%H7431><s%> and of every creeping thing הָרֹמֵ֥שׂ <S%H7430><s%> that creepeth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> upon the earth [הֹוצֵא כ] (הַיְצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> after ק) אִתָּ֑ךְ <S%H854><s%> for וְשָֽׁרְצ֣וּ <S%H8317><s%> that they may breed abundantly בָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the earth וּפָר֥וּ <S%H6509><s%> and be fruitful וְרָב֖וּ <S%H7235><s%> and multiply עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> upon the earth

וַיֵּ֖צֵא־ <S%H3318><s%> went forth נֹ֑חַ <S%H5146><s%> And Noah וּבָנָ֛יו <S%H1121><s%> and his sons וְאִשְׁתּ֥וֹ <S%H802><s%> and his wife וּנְשֵֽׁי־ <S%H802><s%> wives בָנָ֖יו <S%H1121><s%> and his sons' אִתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H854><s%> for

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> [and] whatsoever הַֽחַיָּ֗ה <S%H2416><s%> Every beast כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every הָרֶ֙מֶשׂ֙ <S%H7431><s%> every creeping thing וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and every הָע֔וֹף <S%H5775><s%> and every fowl כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> everything רוֹמֵ֣שׂ <S%H7430><s%> creepeth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> upon the earth לְמִשְׁפְּחֹ֣תֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H4940><s%> after their kinds יָצְא֖וּ <S%H3318><s%> went forth מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַתֵּבָֽה׃ <S%H8392><s%> out of the ark

וַיִּ֥בֶן <S%H1129><s%> builded נֹ֛חַ <S%H5146><s%> And Noah מִזְבֵּ֖חַ <S%H4196><s%> an altar לַֽיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD וַיִּקַּ֞ח <S%H3947><s%> and took מִכֹּ֣ל ׀ <S%H3605><s%> of every הַבְּהֵמָ֣ה <S%H929><s%> beast הַטְּהוֹרָ֗ה <S%H2889><s%> of every clean וּמִכֹּל֙ <S%H3605><s%> every הָע֣וֹף <S%H5775><s%> fowl הַטָּהֹ֔ר <S%H2889><s%> and of every clean וַיַּ֥עַל <S%H5927><s%> and offered עֹלֹ֖ת <S%H5930><s%> burnt offerings בַּמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <S%H4196><s%> on the altar

וַיָּ֣רַח <S%H7306><s%> smelled יְהוָה֮ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רֵ֣יחַ <S%H7381><s%> savour הַנִּיחֹחַ֒ <S%H5207><s%> a sweet וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> in לִבּ֗וֹ <S%H3820><s%> his heart לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not אֹ֠סִף <S%H3254><s%> I will not again לְקַלֵּ֨ל <S%H7043><s%> curse ע֤וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָֽאֲדָמָה֙ <S%H127><s%> the ground בַּעֲב֣וּר <S%H5668><s%> sake הָֽאָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> any more for man's כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> for יֵ֣צֶר <S%H3336><s%> for the imagination לֵ֧ב <S%H3820><s%> heart הָאָדָ֛ם <S%H120><s%> of man's רַ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> [is] evil מִנְּעֻרָ֑יו <S%H5271><s%> from his youth וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not אֹסִ֥ף <S%H3254><s%> neither will I again ע֛וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again לְהַכּ֥וֹת <S%H5221><s%> smite אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every חַ֖י <S%H2416><s%> any more every thing living כַּֽאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> I עָשִֽׂיתִי׃ <S%H6213><s%> as I have done

עֹ֖ד <S%H5750><s%> While כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner יְמֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> remaineth הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> While the earth זֶ֡רַע <S%H2233><s%> seedtime וְ֠קָצִיר <S%H7105><s%> and harvest וְקֹ֨ר <S%H7120><s%> and cold וָחֹ֜ם <S%H2527><s%> and heat וְקַ֧יִץ <S%H7019><s%> and summer וָחֹ֛רֶף <S%H2779><s%> and winter וְי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> and day וָלַ֖יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> and night לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not יִשְׁבֹּֽתוּ׃ <S%H7673><s%> shall not cease
